customer_reviews.title: Best Sunscreen Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic sunscreen. It is watery rather than creamy, so the application doesn't feel sticky. It works as a real sunscreen should, as well, with fairly complete coverage. Shake it, spray it in your hand, apply. Great for the face as well.

customer_reviews.title: Spray function doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the bottle or the formula of the sunscreen, but it requires so much effort to press the top down that it's pretty useless. Sometimes I am able to exert enough effort onto it to get it to spray, other times I just unscrew the top and use it as a regular lotion, (though granted, it's way too liquidy to use this way). Most of the time I just use something else. Such a bummer because it was so expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mineral Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product for my sister, and this is her favorite sunscreen. She says this is a life saver for people with dark skin, because in her experience most mineral sunscreens leave an unflattering white cast. However, this leaves no white cast, which she says is a huge deal in and of itself, and that alone makes this product worth the money. She also mentioned that It doesn’t feel greasy. She likes to follow the directions on the bottle and puts two layers on before going outside. Each bottle lasts her at least two months.
